member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.CapabilityInspector
member.summary: This helper class issues requests to determine what capabilities a GraphQL server has.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionClient
member.summary: A utility for inspecting GraphQL server feature support and for introspecting a GraphQL server.

member.name: M:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionClient.IntrospectServerAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads the schema information from a GraphQL server and returns the schema syntax tree.
member.param: The HttpClient that shall be used to execute the introspection query.
member.returns: Returns a parsed GraphQL schema syntax tree.

member.returns: Returns a parsed GraphQL schema syntax tree.

member.name: M:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionClient.InspectServerAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the supported GraphQL server capabilities from the server by doing an introspection query.
member.param: The HttpClient that shall be used to execute the introspection query.
member.returns: Returns an object that indicates what capabilities the GraphQL server has.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionException
member.summary: This exception is thrown if an error happens during introspection.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionFormatter
member.summary: A utility to format an introspection result into a GraphQL schema document.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionOptions
member.summary: Represents the GraphQL introspection options.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionOptions.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP method that shall be used for the introspection request.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionOptions.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the GraphQL server .

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionOptions.OnMessageCreated
member.summary: Gets or sets a hook that can alter the before it is sent.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionOptions.TypeDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines how deep the introspection request shall dive into types.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.IntrospectionQueryBuilder
member.summary: A utility to build the GraphQL introspection request document.

member.name: T:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities
member.summary: Represents the capabilities that are supported by a GraphQL server.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasDirectiveLocations
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the server supports the newer directive locations on when introspecting.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasRepeatableDirectives
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the server supports the repeatable directives.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasSubscriptionSupport
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the server supports subscriptions.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasDeferSupport
member.summary: Gets a value that defines if the GraphQL server supports the @defer directive.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasStreamSupport
member.summary: Gets a value that defines if the GraphQL server supports the @stream directive.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasArgumentDeprecation
member.summary: Gets a value that defines if the GraphQL server supports argument deprecation.

member.name: P:HotChocolate.Utilities.Introspection.ServerCapabilities.HasSchemaDescription
member.summary: Gets a value that defines if the GraphQL server supports schema descriptions.
